title: HYPER FLEXIBILITY WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
This girl is one of Dr. Paret's students from his Masterclass in Russia. She didn't know that she can be more flexible than she is but with non-verbal hypnosis many impossible things become possible. Dr. Paret used the technique of Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze, which he teaches to his students, and the subject became more flexible without any said words from Dr. Paret. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
